title: French Onion Soup
directions: Halve the onions and slice into thin strips.
Combine all ingredients into a large pot placed on your largest burner. Bring the mixture to a boil, then simmer for approximately 7 hours.
Serve in bowls. Cover soup with the cheese immediately, which should melt due to the heat.
ingredients: Cayenne, minced garlic, garlic powder to taste
